Storage

Class DateTime

  • Object
    • Storage.DateTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<DateTime>

    public class DateTime
extends Object
implements Comparable<DateTime>
    The DateTime class encapsulates date and time attributes in a single package. Date and time attributes are managed as Strings. Date String is internally split into day, month, and year integer attributes for easier access. Date and time formats, respectively: "DD/MM/YYYY" and "HHMM".
    Author:
    Pierce Anderson Fu

    • Constructor Detail

      • DateTime

        public DateTime()
        Default constructor. Attributes are initialized as empty Strings and zeroed integers.

      • DateTime

        public DateTime(String date,
                String time)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        date - Format: "DD/MM/YYYY" or empty String.
        time - Format: "HHMM" or empty String.

      • DateTime

        public DateTime(DateTime dateTime)
        Cloning constructor. Takes a DateTime object, clones its date and time attributes by value, and creates a new DateTime object with the cloned values.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - The existing DateTime object to clone date and time attributes by value from.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(DateTime otherDateTime)
        Compares this DateTime with an input DateTime
        Returns 1 if it is later (larger) than the other DateTime, 0 if they are the same, or -1 if it is earlier (smaller).
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<DateTime>
        Returns:
        • 1 if this DateTime is later than the input DateTime,
        • 0 if they are the same date and time,
        • -1 if this is earlier.
